name: Typical Tower Defense
description:
It's an endless Tower Defense

This game is the prototype for starting the development of a full-fledged Tower Defense game

I am developing this game alone and would like to see the audience reaction
If the audience accepts the game, I will continue development
There are many small details and gameplay mechanics in the development plan, such as:
- Traps
- Special abilities like airstrikes
- Return fire from units walking across the map
- Air units
and much more

Further development depends on people's interest
